titles.title: Monroe County HUBZone Extension Act of 2011
To extend temporarily the treatment of Monroe County, Pennsylvania, as a HUBZone, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 7/6/2011--Introduced. Monroe County HUBZone Act of 2011 - Provides that, for purposes of the Small Business Act, Monroe County, Pennsylvania, shall be a HUBZone (historically underutilized business zone) during the three-year period beginning on October 1, 2011.
